item.title: 9 Best Dry Shampoos, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: I spent months testing 30 dry shampoos on day-two hair and beyond—these are the most effective formulas you can buy.

item.title: Amazon Has Made a Robot With a Sense of Touch
item.description: Vulcan, a robot with tactile senses, is a step towards automating more of picking and stowing work done by humans inside Amazon’s fulfillment centers.
